modName: Basic Blender Files for Import and Export Armors and Clothes
descriptionHtml:
Basic Blendfiles with Armature and Body.

This little tool helps you to import and export armors and clothes.
It is a complede Skeleton.nif with body.

Included files:
================
1 - Male skeleton with complede body
2 - Female skeleton with complede body

Complede body:
==============
Slim Version male and female - Hands, Feet and Body
Thick Version male and female - Hands, Feet and Body
Head

Usage:
======
Load one of the basicfiles and then import the armor or cloth that you want to modify or start up a new armor.

For more infos, watch my tutorial how it works.

Change Log
==============
V2 - Littel Bugfix in Male Skeleton.
V1 - Release

Credits and Thanks:
==================
Thanks to the people from Niftools.org, for her great job to create Nifskope and the Nifscripts.
Thanks to Bethesda for a great game.
Caliente for Caliente\'s Body Mod
Ein herzliches Danke an meine Freunde von Spieleabend für ihre Kritik und Unterstützung.

[img]http://www10.pic-upload.de/15.03.12/pblf9z49c469.png[/img]

Gruß Malo
author: Malo
